news.subject: News
news.title: A man is found stuck in the bathroom
news.description: Johnattan Carter, 26, Ohio, was found stuck in his own bathroom for three days. When asked to him why, he told us: 'I forgot the towel'
news.author: Tom Louise

news.subject: YouTube
news.title: MrBeast has been trolled by a YouTuber
news.description: Check the link for the full video: www.youtube.com/hd3523zds
news.author: John Lavinski
